divs: sighting detailsmyself and two of my sons were sky watching when a silvery saucer or diamond shaped craft appeared from the northwest heading toward the west fairly fast. because of the surrounding trees we could only observe a few seconds of it's passing. it made a very loud growling\hovercraft-like\jet-like sound as it traveled very low considering it's size. my son, a veteran, said it sounded like a fighter jet but it didn't look anything like one. we don't know what what this object was but we think it made two passes 15-20 minutes apart following the same exact flight pattern. if it's a military vehicle what the heck is it doing in a residential neighborhood at 11:00p.m.? and if it wasn't military...what was it? we lost site of the object when it's flight pattern placed it behind a neighbor's pine tree.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There were no other sightings in Murrysville on or around June 26th 2012
Summary: A large diamond or saucer shaped craft appeared twice within 20 minutes. It made a furocious sound, had many white lights around it's exterior and had a red light on the top of it.
